bibdata.title: Draft Standard General Requirements and Test Code for Dry-Type and Oil-Immersed Smoothing Reactors for DC Power Transmission
Draft Standard General Requirements and Test Code for Dry-Type and Oil-Immersed Smoothing Reactors for DC Power Transmission
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1277/D6, Nov 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The electrical, mechanical, and physical requirements of oil-immersed and dry-type air core smoothing reactors for high-voltage direct current (HVDC) applications are specified. Test code is defined and appropriate technical background information is presented or identified.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
